Intro: Big believer in constant self-improvement and growth. Productivity freak and a philomath with an eclectic range of interests. Iâ€™ve been into the world of programming since 2012. I started with C++, then Java, .NET (C#) and in later years JavaScript, PHP and Python. My focus in the field right now is Full Stack Web Development with expanding interest in Mobile Development, Machine Learning and Artificial Intelligence.

Passions.Name: Weightlifting
Passions.Desc: To perform at my best I have to stay in shape. Simple as that. Can't function properly unless I get a therapy session regularly. Most of my business and application ideas came while in the gym. The rest - in the shower.

Passions.Name: Rockclimbing
Passions.Desc: As someone who fears heights, rock climbing has recently become a challenging but rewarding hobby. Quite addictive, as well.

Passions.Name: Music
Passions.Desc: Life without music would be a mistake - as Nietzsche said. I agree as a wholehearted consumer and occasional creator.

Passions.Name: Software Development
Passions.Desc: I consider myself a creator. As such, the choice of software development as a career path follows naturally. As a developer, I have the power to create almost anything. In the vast sea of software development, I currently cruise around web, mobile, and machine learning.

Passions.Name: Reading / Writing
Passions.Desc: As someone who takes pleasure in creating - writing is a natural inclination even if it has not always been the case. Reading keeps me growing and sane.

Passions.Name: Psychology / Philosophy
Passions.Desc: I believe psychology should be mandatory education found in every school curriculum just as science and software development. It helps understand yourself and maybe even people in general. Philosophy, on the other hand, helps understand life.

Passions.Name: Personal Development
Passions.Desc: In my opinion, in order to live a fullfilled live, balance is key. Balance in the sense of building yourself to a complete person. For me, that means keeping my body in shape, enhance my athletism, hone the mind and cultivate my creativity.

Passions.Name: Neuroscience
Passions.Desc: I have not achieved the level of proficiency I would like to have in this field. However, I still find the hardware of our brains just as fascinating as it's software. Especially, its applicability to computer science.
